headline: The Hartford Declares Quarterly Dividends Of $0.52 Per Share Of Common Stock And $375 Per Share Of Series G Preferred Stock
summary: The Hartford's Board of Directors declared a dividend of $0.52 per share of common stock, payable July 2 to common stock shareholders of record at the close of business on June 2.The board also...
